ygData.subject: Re: [eq_wizards] soloing
ygData.msgSnippet: I haven t played a wizard in a long long time, and honestly forgot about this news group. Your best bet in terms of information would be to head on over to
ygData.messageBody:
I haven't played a wizard in a long long time, and
honestly forgot about this news group. Your best bet
in terms of information would be to head on over to
www.graffe.com; there are very active forums there as
well as a number of very good guides on where/how to
quad, quests, etc.

J-boots are nice, but SOW potions or druid buffs are
easy to get. Once you get to 51, J-boots become a bit
obsolete with the AA Run 3 option, so they may not be
worth killing greenies over and over. But if you can
get exp out of it, for sure!

--- MTS <rhythair@...> wrote:
> Thanks for the help Zifnab :) People seem to be
> re-emerging from the
> dungeons, but I definitely want to be able to solo.
> First thing on
> my list is the journeyman's boots quest.
>
> Siriln Starfire of Felwithe
> 35 wizard of Tunare
> Legion of Kithicor
>
>
